conditions.description: A list of use conditions that apply to the information or data assets.

label.description: A human readable name of the vocabulary/ontology condition term, such as DUO ‘Disease specific research’.

uri.description: A URI to the vocabulary/ontology term, such as DUO URI: ‘http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/DUO_0000007’.

label.description: Optional human readable name of the vocabulary/ontology used as a parameter, such as Alzheimer's Disease, to apply on the conditionTerm.

uri.description: Optional URI to the ontology term for the conditionParameter, such as a MONDO URI: ‘http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/MONDO_0004975’.

value.description: Optional value for the conditionParameter if any.

rule.description: The direction to interpret the condition term.

scope.description: A scope to state if this condition applies to all or part-of the data in the resource asset that this DUC profile is associated with (see ‘resources’ object).  Whole of Asset should be the default.

profileId.description: Optional URI with unique identifier of this DUC profile (e.g., https://domain/UUID).

profileVersion.description: Optional semantic version of this DUC profile (e.g., 0.0.1).

profileName.description: Optional name of this DUC profile.

ducVersion.description: Optional semantic version of the DUC schema (e.g., 0.0.1).

creationDate.description: Optional date this DUC profile was first created in ISO 8601 format.

lastUpdated.description: Optional date this DUC profile was most recently updated in ISO 8601 format.

assets.description: Optional list of assets to which the conditions apply. Specify names, descriptions, references and URI to their asset object (for example DCAT).

assetReferences.description: Optional list of web links to external documents describing the asset(s) this profile applies to, such as publications.

assetURI.description: Optional URI for the asset catalogue-level object (for example a DCAT object).

permissionMode.description: Optional default interpretation for all unstated conditions.

language.description: Optional ISO 639-3 letter code for the language used in this DUC profile.
